name: Game Where You Fight!
description:
Beat up your friend,  1-2 players

im currently learning game dev. this is the playground ive made for it.

VS mode requires a controller.

Controls

_____________________________

WASD - move

Left click - Punch

Right click - Ranged Attack

S - Crouch

Player can WallSlide, Wall Jump and Double Jump

Each player spawns with 5 Ammo

every melee hit replenishes ammo by 1
